title: Renault shares slump after carmaker issues sales warning
text:
Renault shares slump after carmaker issues sales warning

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 03:17)

PARIS (Reuters) - Renault (PA: ) shares slumped on Friday after the French carmaker cut its revenue guidance for 2019 and lowered its profitability forecast. Renault shares were down 11% in early trading. After the market closed on Thursday, Renault said sales were likely to drop between 3% and 4% this year. The company also said its operating margin was set to come in at 5%, versus a previous 6% goal. "Overall, there are too many uncertainties today," wrote Deutsche Bank (DE: ) analysts, as they cut their rating on Renault to "hold" from "buy".
